title: Ep 100 | Phil's Advice for Single People, 'Wedleases,' and Jase and Missy's Biggest Argument
description:
Thank you, Unashamed Nation, for hanging out with us for 100 episodes! In this one, Phil, Jase, and Al discuss "wedleases" vs. marriage, patriarchy, the horror of neckties, anatidaephobia, and America in 1920. Phil explains why he calls his butler "Dan the Eunuch" and offers his advice on being single. Jase reveals the biggest argument he and Missy have ever had. Al offends all women. And we close with an exclusive surprise for our Unashamed audience.
